titles.title: To change election day for Federal offices to the first Monday in November and to make election day a legal public holiday.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census, Statistics and Postal Personnel.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Elections.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/24/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal law to: (1) change election day for Federal offices to the first Monday in November; and (2) make election day a legal public holiday.
